title: Colombian Luxury Nature Lodge Experience with Daily Cocktails & US$150 Resort Credit
description:
Peeking out from the ancient hilltops of the Antioquian Forest is Cannúa Lodge, an eco-luxury resort overlooking the biodiverse Valle de San Nicolás - just 45 minutes from José María Córdova International Airport, in the heart of Colombia. One of Condé Nast Traveler’s most acclaimed new nature lodges of 2019, this unique eco-lodge is a tranquil retreat where the environment is central to the experience: hike the pre-hispanic trails of the Muisca people, smell the coffee and listen to birdsong from your private balcony. Then, indulge at the onsite spa and farm-to-table restaurant.

Relax and enjoy daily à la carte breakfast, one daily house cocktail per adult, US$150 resort credit to put towards onsite dining, spa treatments and experiences, return airport transfers, and early check-in and late checkout when available.
offer_address: Vda Gaviria KM 7+200, Marinilla, Antioquia, Colombia
